other_tests.findings: Dense inflammatory infiltrate consisting of neutrophils, eosinophils, lymphocytes, and histiocytes; atypical cell populations expressed CD1a, CD4, and S-100 protein consistent with Langerhans cell histiocytosis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient had an excellent response to treatment, remained in remission at the time of submission.

other_tests.findings: Did not reveal any mutation in the c-kit proto-oncogene.
Serum tryptase levels were 10 and 8 ng/mL in the two twins, respectively (reference value <20 ng/mL).
